doc.field: Bulk are materials re: Katrina/New Orleans: photos of Spadafora; tearsheets/clippings/WNYF article/other print matter; "Fed Response: Lessons Learned"; memo "FDNY after action review of the New Orleans deployment (2005); memo "Second deployment" by Spadafora and Robert Sweeney (they were sent to relieve first deployment starting Sept 15, 2005); Spadafora's after-action report (Oct 2005); certificate of appreciation to Spadafora; binder of Spadafora notes, blank forms, and info; incident action plans and other related plans for Holy Cross complex; several other documents related to FDNY Hurricane Katrina Relief Task Force; status reports (Sept 2005); several scrunched up and folded oversize maps and other images re: New Orleans matter. Artifacts: Spadafora's Unified Katrina Command ID badge, Mardi Gras beads, sealed packet of food in containers, a few incident management pins. Small packet of documents (travel-related and snapshots) re: Spadafora presentation in Montana (2003). (Includes artifacts)
